I.ii.1.C.3.f
.
Weekly Accuracy Logs for Quality Assurance Reviews of Scanned Documents
PMC Capture Units will maintain a weekly scanning accuracy log for a period of three years.
A supervisor at the PMC Capture Unit who has direct knowledge of the process shall certify the accuracy of the scanning log.
Reference
:  For a sample weekly accuracy scanning log, see
M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, 1.C.3.g
.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C - Pension Management Center (PMC) Procedures
citation: Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C
